text:
Clinic close for lunch at 12.30 pm to 2 pm. Will start to accept patient at 12.15 pm. Luckily i reach there at 12.10 pm and managed to register and see the doctor. Dr Loo is good, but not exam the patient in very detail. Probably i am just the normal cough and flu.

I am not fever, but i said i feel hot. The doctor was nice and also give me the fever medicine.

I claim the medic fee under company insurance. But if this is under personal payment, I would not suggest you to go. But for normal/general sick and claim under company insurance, you may consider. Doctor give A LOT medicinessss

Dr Loo is a real gem, she’s knowledgeable and super friendly, I feel much better both mentally and physically after visiting her.

Kudos to receptionist Puteri, she’s always efficient and friendly. Highly recommend the clinic

Recommended by my colleagues to consult with Dr Loo! She was patient and attentive, and answered everything I needed.

Would definitely come by again!

I went to this clinic on 7 Oct 24 during lunch hour around 12 plus. So while I was waiting for my turn to register, I was trying to push the pen holder nearer to the desk as I saw it was going to drop. However, this reception lady gaves me a frustration tone that she though I was trying to write on a paper. As I ask her again what she was trying to say, she sound frustrated. Even when she told me today the doctor is a relieved doctor, her tone is not nice and sound frustrated. I don't see her treated other patient this way. What have I done wrong to deserve such treatment??? She didn't even call my name for the collection of medication. She called me "Mdm" in a unfriendly manner...and I didnt know i have to paid for the carrier.....Gosh!! Is this right? This is the first time I encounter this!

Most importantly,  the attitidue of your staff is not right that my experience feel awful! I will not recommend anyone to this clinic. Please train your staff to be polite and not to be judgmental!!!
Did my blood drawing and vaccination with Dr Loo, she was very efficient and made small talk to keep me comfortable! Very happy with my experience! Front desk admin and nurses were pleasant as well!
